description: Fols. 113; 18.2 x 13.6 cm.; written surface 14 x 10 cm.; 23 lines to page; on glazed Arabic paper; in Fārisi; with catchwords. A biographical dictionary of the illustrious men of Damascus. Beg.: وهذا اوان الشروع في تراجم الشىوخ الاول Ending: والقبض والتوکىل في الشراء ... بصىغة الاداء Marginal notes and glosses; marginal summaries. MS incomplete at beginning and end; in good condition; Arabic cloth binding. Believed to be an autograph manuscript by Ibn Ṭūlūn. Acquired from Bārūdī, Beirūt, A.D. 1925.
attributed name: Ibn Ṭūlūn, Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī, 1475-1546
title: Tarājim shuyūkh Dimashq
contributor: ابن طولون، شمس الدين محمد بن علي، 1485?-1546
subject: Muslim scholars—Syria—Damascus—Biography—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
